RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRemoteCandidateI.summary:
The property
remoteCandidateId is a string that uniquely identifies
the remote ICE candidate which was analyzed to generate the
used to compute the statistics for this pair of
candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRemoteCandidateI.value:
A string uniquely identifies the remote ICE
candidate—that is, the candidate describing a configuration for the remote peer—which is
represented by the remote end of these statistics.
